history.proof: intros a. unfold pointwise_relation. intros x. apply a.

exceptions.tactic: intros A B R g f a.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: Type
R: relation B
g: A -> B
f: A -> B

Goal:
RIntro (forall a : A, R (f a) (g a)) (pointwise_relation A R) f g

Premises:
RIntro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RIntro {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
pointwise_relation : forall A B : Type, relation B -> relation (A -> B)
forall_relation_rintro : forall (R0 : forall a : ?A, relation (?B a)) (f0 g0 : forall x : ?A, ?B x), RIntro (forall a : ?A, R0 a (f0 a) (g0 a)) (forall_relation R0) f0 g0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?A -> Type]
req_rintro : forall a : ?A, RIntro True (req a) a a where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
forall_relation_relim : forall (R0 : forall a : ?A, relation (?B a)) (f0 g0 : forall x : ?A, ?B x) (a : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R0 a) (f0 a) (g0 a) P Q -> RElim (forall_relation R0) f0 g0 P Q where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?A -> Type]
arrow_pointwise_refl = fun (T A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) (x : T -> A) (a : T) => (fun H0 : R (x a) (x a) => H0) (H (x a)) : forall (T A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (- ==> R) Arguments arrow_pointwise_refl {T A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
Related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) => R f g : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> Prop Arguments Related {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
rel_all_rintro : forall (R0 : ?C -> rel ?A ?B) (m : ?A) (n : ?B), RIntro (forall c : ?C, R0 c m n) (rforall y, R0 y) m n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?C : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_rintro : forall (R0 : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f0 : ?A -> ?B1) (g0 : ?A -> ?B2), RIntro (forall x : ?A, R0 (f0 x) (g0 x)) (- ==> R0) f0 g0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
forall_rel : (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> rel (?FV1 v1) (?FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, ?FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, ?FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V2 -> Type]
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f0 : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g0 : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f0 x) (g0 y)) (RA ++> RB) f0 g0 where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
respectful_rintro : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B) (f0 g0 : ?A -> ?B), RIntro (forall x y : ?A, RA x y -> RB (f0 x) (g0 y)) (RA ==> RB)%signature f0 g0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
rel_top_rintro : forall (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RIntro True ⊤ x y where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a

forall_pointwise_rel : (forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) -> rel (forall v : ?V, ?FV1 v) (forall v : ?V, ?FV2 v) where ?V : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V -> Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
rel_pull = fun (A B A' B' : Type) (f : A -> A') (g : B -> B') (R : rel A' B') (x : A) (y : B) => R (f x) (g y) : forall A B A' B' : Type, (A -> A') -> (B -> B') -> rel A' B' -> rel A B Arguments rel_pull {A B A' B'}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
req_intro : forall a : ?A, req a a a where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a

Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0

rel_push_rintro : forall (f0 : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g0 : ?A2 -> ?B2) (R0 : rel ?A1 ?A2) (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RIntro (R0 x y) R0 !! (f0, g0) (f0 x) (g0 y) where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
forallp_rintro : forall (FE : forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), rel (?F1 v1) (?F2 v2)) (f0 : forall x : ?V1, ?F1 x) (g0 : forall x : ?V2, ?F2 x), RIntro (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> FE v1 v2 (f0 v1) (g0 v2)) (forallr v1 v2 : ?E, FE v1 v2) f0 g0 where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A ->...-> Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
flip_rintro : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?B) (n : ?A), RIntro (R0 n m) (flip R0) m n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]

Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
forall_pointwise_rintro : forall (FE : forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) (f0 : forall x : ?V, ?FV1 x) (g0 : forall x : ?V, ?FV2 x), RIntro (forall v : ?V, FE v (f0 v) (g0 v)) (forallr - @ v, FE v) f0 g0 where ?V : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V -> Type]
forall_rintro : forall (FE : forall (x : ?V1) (y : ?V2), ?E x y -> rel (?F1 x) (?F2 y)) (f0 : forall x : ?V1, ?F1 x) (g0 : forall x : ?V2, ?F2 x), RIntro (forall (u : ?V1) (v : ?V2) (e : ?E u v), FE u v e (f0 u) (g0 v)) (forallr e @ v1 v2, FE v1 v2 e) f0 g0 where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?F1 : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A ->...-> Type]
rel_inter_glb : forall R0 R1 R2 : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R0 R1 /\ subrel R0 R2) subrel R0 (R1 /\ R2)%rel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
rel_union_lub : forall R1 R2 R0 : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R1 R0 /\ subrel R2 R0) subrel (R1 \/ R2)%rel R0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : relation B f : A -> B g : A -> B |- Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z \/ R z y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a

intros A B R g f a.
unfold pointwise_relation.
intros x.
apply a.
